column7:
- Weighs 80g 
- Made with 100% Remy synthetic fiber
- Feels soft and natural, similar to human hair
- Delivers the luxurious look and feel of human hair at a fraction of the cost
- Heat resistant for flexible styling
- Ideal for ponytails, partial installs, or full-head weaves
- High-quality, durable fibers for a sleek and polished finish

- Weighs 75g
- Loose curl braiding hair for a soft, romantic finish
- Adds volume, movement, and natural-looking curls
- Lightweight with a defined, bouncy texture
- Perfect for Boho braids, Goddess braids, and Knotless braids
- Ideal for Passion twists, crochet styles, and protective hairstyles
- Designed for trendy, effortless, and versatile styling

- Weighs 150g
- Spiral French Curl synthetic braid for added length and volume
- High-quality synthetic fibre with defined, bouncy curls
- Flame resistant for safer styling
- Hot-water set friendly – shape and customise curls with ease
- Ideal for braids, twists, and creative protective styles
- Lightweight and versatile for enhanced flair and long-lasting style

- Each bundle weighs 180g
- 3X Pre-Stretched synthetic braiding hair for faster, stress-free installation
- High-quality synthetic fiber with a soft, lightweight feel
- Natural look and texture for a clean, polished finish
- Time-saving pre-stretched design reduces prep and tangling
- Durable and long-lasting for extended wear
- Ideal for braids, twists, and protective styles
- Allows for versatile styling with extra length and volume

- Weighs 150g
- Made from high-quality synthetic fibre
- 5–6 bundles recommended for a full, voluminous look
- Shedding-free and tangle-free for easy maintenance
- Soft, silky, and lustrous strands with a natural feel
- Suitable for all hair textures

- Weighs 60g
- Made with low-temperature premium synthetic fiber
- 3–4 packs recommended for a full-head installation
- Soft, lightweight, and natural-looking strands
- Ideal for vixen crochet installs with seamless parting and natural leave-out
- No visible tracks for a flawless finish
- Blends beautifully with natural hair, especially Black hair textures
- Suitable for everyday wear and special occasions
- Offers versatility, realism, and confident styling

column2: We need to discuss delivery charges
